ygData.subject: Re: Skills
ygData.msgSnippet: Trade Skills I know for sure do not have a level cap for skill.  I have a friend who is a Dark Elf Necromancer on Fennin Ro.  At level 17 he has a Smihting
ygData.messageBody:
Trade Skills I know for sure do not have a level cap for skill. I have a
friend who is a Dark Elf Necromancer on Fennin Ro. At level 17 he has a
Smihting skill 126. By the level+1 times 5 rule he should be maxed at 85.
However, this is not the case. Any of the trade skills as well as swimming
(yes I am counting Fishing as a trade skill) have a 255 skill cap but none
other based on level that I have seen.

Lomack

>
>Message: 16
> Date: Tue, 4 May 1999 08:43:42 -0400
> From: "McGraw, T. David" <Mcgraw.Thomas@...>
>Subject: Re: Skills
>
>All skills have a cap based on level now. This was implemented towards the
>end of the beta contrary to what Brad preached about not having to kill bats
>to become a better fisherman.
>
>Yours,
>
>~Aereuss Ravins of Tarew Marr
>
>PS -- I have not tested this with any trade skill other than fishing, if
>anyone has any information on those please let me know.
>

Long Live the Brotherhood,
Lomack, BCK-MoR
